DESCRIPTION: Removes leading and trailing spaces and control characters from a string.
EXAMPLE: <h3>Trim Example</h3> <cfif IsDefined("FORM.myText")> <cfoutput> <pre> Your string: "#FORM.myText#" Your string: "#Trim(FORM.myText)#" (trimmed on both sides) </pre> </cfoutput> </cfif> <form method = "post" action = "trim.cfm"> <p>Type in some text, and it will be modified by trim to remove leading spaces from the left and right <p><input type = "Text" name = "myText" value = " TEST "> <p><input type = "Submit" name = ""> </form>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: A string or a variable that contains a string.
